attr.title: Death Ray Manta
attr.desc: Death Ray Manta is a short form top down arena shooter where you blow up enemies using colourful laserbeams. You spawn in the centre of the screen, moments later the screen is filled with mines, robots, rabbits and lasers from beyond the stars. Collect space gems for a bonus and shoot everything else that you can in order to flash lights at yourself. Aim for your own personal high score. How far into fish space can you get?
attr.inst:
Purchase your game Steam OR Itch.io
Download the latest version of the game.
Copy the game files into ports/deathraymanta/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase your game [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/338760/Death_Ray_Manta_SE/) OR [Itch.io](https://thalamusdigital.itch.io/death-ray-manta-se)
Download the latest version of the game.
Copy the game files into ports/deathraymanta/assets
